Class Grass

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Grass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor

    public class Grass
extends java.lang.Object
implements Actor
    This class make grass and allows it to grow and die if it has been eaten
    Version:
    2012.02.07
    Author:
    Marco, Malcolm, Harold
